title: Hoka! Hoka! Hoka!
description: One Hoka is a threat to human sanity. Two Hokas are a menace to civilization. And three Hokas . . . Heaven help the galaxy, in this hilarious science fiction adventure from two of the best writers in the genre.Contents:Prologue"The Sheriff of Canyon Gulch"Interlude I"Don Jones"Interlude II"In Hoka Signo Vinces"Interlude III"The Adventure of the Misplaced Hound"Interlude IV"Yo Ho Hoka!"Interlude V"The Tiddlywink Warriors"Interlude VI"Joy in Mudville""Undiplomatic Immunity"Mysterious Message
author: Poul Anderson
